items.name: Doedre's Damning
explicitMods: +20 to Intelligence
+8% to all Elemental Resistances
Gain 17 Mana per Enemy Killed
You can apply an additional Curse
flavourText: Where her mouth should have been
there was only a whirling, black void.

items.name: Heretic's Veil
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
explicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 22 Blasphemy
Socketed Curse Gems have 30% increased Reservation Efficiency
97% increased Evasion and Energy Shield
+40 to maximum Energy Shield
flavourText: Branded a heretic for your beliefs,
You stand alone against many.
May the truth that fuels their anger,
Carry your blade into their hearts.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Chaos, Curse, Hex

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their chaos resistance.
explicitMods: Base duration is 11.80 seconds
+1 metre to radius
10% increased Effect of Curse
Cursed enemies have -30% to Chaos Resistance
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, causing them to be debilitated when they hit enemies and increasing damage they take while on low life.
explicitMods: Base duration is 11.80 seconds
+1 metre to radius
10% increased Effect of Curse
Cursed Enemies take 58% increased Damage while on Low Life
Cursed Enemies are Debilitated for 2.00 Seconds when they Hit
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, reducing their accuracy and making them deal less damage.
explicitMods: Base duration is 11.80 seconds
20% increased Curse Duration
+1 metre to radius
Cursed enemies have 19% reduced Accuracy Rating
Cursed Normal or Magic enemies deal 29% less Damage
Cursed Rare or Unique enemies deal 18% less Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their elemental resistances.

socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Star of Wraeclast
explicitMods: Grants Level 10 Frostblink Skill
44% increased Cold Damage
+12% to all Elemental Resistances
60% increased Area of Effect of Hex Skills
You cannot be Cursed with Silence
Frostblink has 50% increased Duration
flavourText: "I offer to you an eternal oath
that binds your heart to mine;
a bond that not even death will break.
Will you accept?"
- Daresso, to his beloved

items.typeLine: Constant Ruby Flask of the Lizard
explicitMods: 17% increased Charge Recovery
48% less Duration
Immunity to Bleeding and Corrupted Blood during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Kingmaker
explicitMods: 304% increased Physical Damage
12% increased Attack Speed
32% increased Critical Strike Chance
Nearby Allies have 30% increased Item Rarity
Nearby Allies have Culling Strike
Insufficient Mana doesn't prevent your Melee Attacks
Nearby Allies have +50% to Critical Strike Multiplier
Nearby Allies have +10 Fortification
flavourText: A King and his people are linked together
like a soul and a beating heart.
Both can be severed by a same edge,
then forged anew.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that increases the movement speed, attack speed and cast speed of you and your allies.

items.name: Vixen's Entrapment
explicitMods: Trigger Socketed Curse Spell when you Cast a Curse Spell, with a 0.25 second Cooldown

0.2% of Spell Damage Leeched as Energy Shield for each Curse on Enemy

One night I wish I'd forget."

items.name: Garb of the Ephemeral
explicitMods: +600 Strength and Intelligence Requirement
203% increased Energy Shield
+10 to maximum Divine Charges
Gain a Divine Charge on Hit

You gain Divinity for 10 seconds on reaching maximum Divine Charges
Lose all Divine Charges when you gain Divinity
Nearby Allies' Action Speed cannot be modified to below base value
Nearby Enemies cannot deal Critical Strikes
flavourText: Exceptional men and women of strong will can flicker a spark,
but something much greater is needed to unleash the wildfire of true divine flames.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports hex curse skills, turning them into auras that will apply their effect to all enemies in an area around you.
explicitMods:
Supported Curse Skills apply their Curses as Auras
Supported Curse Skills also count as Aura Skills
Using Supported Skills is Instant
25% less Effect of Supported Curses
99% increased Area of Effect of Supported Curse Skills
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all enemies in an area, lowering their action speed and making other effects on them expire more slowly.

20% increased Curse Duration
+0.9 metres to radius
50% less Effect of Curse against Players
Cursed Normal and Magic Enemies have 28% less Action Speed
Other effects on Cursed enemies expire 25% slower
Cursed Rare and Unique Enemies have 18% less Action Speed

socketedItems.secDescrText: Take less Physical and Elemental Damage for a short time. Consumes up to 5 Endurance Charges to lengthen the buff and further lessen Physical Damage taken. Shares a cooldown with other Guard skills.

20% increased Buff Duration per Endurance Charge removed
This Skill's Cooldown does not recover during its effect
25% less Elemental Damage taken
25% less Physical Damage taken
15.0% less Physical Damage taken per Endurance Charge removed

socketedItems.secDescrText: Each supported spell skill will track damage you take, and be triggered when the total damage taken reaches a threshold. Cannot support skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Vaal skills, channelling skills, and skills with a reservation cannot be triggered.
